sqlMap.select: SELECT A.CNT +B.CNT AS CNT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CTGI01 WHERE SAUPJA_NO = #saupjaNo# AND GYEYAK_JIBU_CD LIKE #gyeyakJibuCd#) A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CTGI01 WHERE SAUPJA_NO = #saupjaNo# AND JOHAPWON_JUMIN_NO = #juminNo# AND GYEYAK_JIBU_CD LIKE #gyeyakJibuCd#) B
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CTGI01 WHERE SAUPJA_NO = #saupjaNoConfirm# AND JOHAPWON_JUMIN_NO = #juminNo# AND DAEPYOJA_NM = #nameConfirm#

select * from ( select c1.AGENT_NO as agentNo, c1.SAUPJA_NO as saupjaNo , c1.AGENT_NM as agentNm, c1.DAEPYOJA_NM as daepyojaNm, '1' as agentCd , c1.BUPIN_NO as bupinNo, c1.SAUPJANG_SEQ as saupjangSeq, c1.gyeyak_jibu_cd as gyeyakJibuCd, c1.JOHAPWON_JUMIN_NO as juminNo, c1.ADDR_GB_CD as addrGbCd, c2.ADDR1||c2.ADDR2 as addr, c1.email as email from CTGI01 c1 inner join CTGI02 c2 on c1.agent_no = c2.agent_no and c1.saupjang_seq = c2.saupjang_seq where JOHAPWON_JUMIN_NO = #juminNo# and SAUPJA_NO = #saupjaNo# and gyeyak_jibu_cd like #gyeyakJibuCd# and c1.agent_no = #agentNo# and RETIRE_YN = 0
) where rownum =1
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ct_user WHERE user_id = #id# AND pass_word = #password#

select * from ( SELECT a.CAR_GAIP_NO as carGaipNo, a.UPJONG_CD as upjongCd, a.CAR_KIND_CD as carKindCd, a.CAR_NO as carNo, a.CAR_BODY_NO as carBodyNo, a.CAR_NM as carNm, a.CAR_NM_CD as carNmCd, a.CARMGR_JUMIN_NO as juminNo, a.AGENT_NO as agentNo, a.SAUPJANG_SEQ as saupjangSeq, '2' as agentCd ,b.CARMGR_NM as carmgrNm ,b.ADDR1||b.ADDR2 as addr ,b.email as email FROM CTGI05 a INNER join CTGI06 b ON a.CARMGR_JUMIN_NO = b.CARMGR_JUMIN_NO where a.CARMGR_JUMIN_NO = #juminNo#
) where rownum =1

select CUST_CD as custCd, CUST_CD as saupjaNo, JIBU_CD as jibuCd, BUBIN_NO as bubinNo, CUST_GB as custGb, TRD_GB as trdGb, CUST_NM as custNm, CUST_CALLNM as custCallnm, PRESI_NM as presiNm, PRESI_JUMINNO as juminNo, '3' as agentCd ,PRESI_JUSO1||PRESI_JUSO2 as addr from ACSD05 where CUST_CD = #saupjaNo# and PRESI_JUMINNO = #juminNo# and ins_ymd = (select max(ins_ymd) from ACSD05 where CUST_CD = #saupjaNo# and PRESI_JUMINNO = #juminNo#) /* 확인필요. ACSD05에 JIBU_CD별로 데이터가 들어있음. 어떤 jibu_cd를 사용해야하는지 확인필요.*/

select a.user_id , a.pass_word, a.name, a.dept_code, a.wk_place_code, a.grade_code, a.grade_name, a.jicwi_cd, f_code_nm('3026', a.jicwi_cd) jicwi_nm, a.jicgeub_cd, a.upmu_cd, substr(b.jibu_cd, 0, 2) jibu_cd, b.jibu_nm
from ct_user a, hrpe01 b
where a.user_id = #user_id# and a.pass_word = #pass_word# and a.wk_place_code = b.jibu_cd
select SAWON_NO, IMAGI_PIC from HRPE14 where sawon_no = #sawon_no#
select b.saupja_no from ctex03 a, ctgi01 b where a.agent_no = b.agent_no and a.damdang_sabun = #user_id#
select b.saupja_no from ctex03 a, ctgi01 b where a.agent_no = b.agent_no and b.gyeyak_jibu_cd = #jibu_cd#
select c.carmgr_jumin_no from ctex03 a, ctgi01 b, ctgi05 c where a.agent_no = b.agent_no and b.agent_no = c.agent_no and trim(c.carmgr_jumin_no) is not null and a.damdang_sabun = #user_id#
